title: Switzerland Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Switzerland increased to 272.90 percent in 2021 from 268.60 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Switzerland averaged 212.80 percent from 1999 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 272.90 percent in 2021 and a record low of 177.10 percent in 2001. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
